类 DynamicFeatureClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.creable.gridgis.geodatabase.DynamicFeatureClass

extends java.lang.Object
implements IFeatureClass, IDynamicFeatureClass, java.io.Serializable
    可动态添加Feature的FeatureClass
